original: 介紹《三國群英傳8》的軍事系統。藉由據點出兵流程，了解「出征」、「沙盤」、「戰鬥」、「召集」等功能，亦可了解戰鬥和部隊編制的相關內容。
text: Introduce the military system of "Three Kingdoms Heroes 8". Through the process of dispatching troops from bases, you can learn about functions such as "departure", "sand table", "combat", and "convene". You can also learn about combat and troop formation.
